attributes.action: Suspend Brunei from the Commonwealth until it removes barbaric homophobic law
attributes.additional_details: Commonwealth charter's 16 core values include:  tolerance, respect, understanding, freedom of expression and the role of a CIVIL society.
attributes.background: Brunei - Commonwealth member since 1984 -  already criminalising gay people, has introduced the death penalty for consenting homosexuality.  This is in clear breach of the Commonwealth charter.  This requires unequivocal condemnation, and a clear signal that persecution cannot be tolerated.
